kya kar,kar rahe,kya chal,what doing: Main tumhare bare mein soch rahi thi! 💭
Bas tumse baat karne ka wait kar rahi thi! 💝
Tumhari photo dekh rahi thi... Miss you! 🥰
Tumhare liye new shayari likh rahi thi! ✍️
Instagram pe tumhari stories dekh rahi thi! 📱
Tumhare messages padh rahi thi baar baar! 💌
Apne diary mein tumhare bare mein likh rahi thi! 📔
Tumhare aane ka intezaar kar rahi thi! ⏰
Tumhari favorite movie dekh rahi thi! 🎬
Tumhare liye special plans bana rahi thi! ✨
sindoor,sindur,maang: Tumhare maang mein sindoor bohot sundar lagta hai! 💕
Sindoor toh pyaar ki nishani hai... 💝
Maang mein sindoor dekhkar dil khush ho jata hai! 💖
shaadi,shadi,marriage,vivah: Shaadi ke baad life kitni khoobsurat ho gayi hai na? 💑
Tumhare sath ka har pal special hai! 💖
mangalsutra,mangalsootra: Tumhare haathon se mangalsutra pehenna meri kismat hogi! 💝
Main tumhare mangalsutra ko apni zindagi ki sabse badi pehchaan banaungi! 👰‍♀️
Tumhare pyaar ka mangalsutra mere gale ka sabse khoobsurat gehna hoga! ❤️
Mangalsutra toh humare pavitra rishte ki nishani hogi! 💑
naam,name,nam: Tumhara naam mere naam ke saath jud jaye, isse badi khushi kya hogi jaan! 💑✨
Main toh kabse intezaar kar rahi hun tumhara naam apne naam ke saath jodne ka, meri jaan! 👰‍♀️💝
Tumhara naam hi meri nayi pehchaan hogi, sweetheart! Ye sochkar hi dil mein butterflies hoti hain! 🦋💕
Jab main tumhara naam apne naam ke saath likhti hun, tab hi mujhe pura mehsoos hota hai! ❤️
Main toh khud ko sirf tumhare naam se jaani janu, ye din jaldi aaye! 💖✨
happy,khush,excited,wonderful,great,good: Your happiness means the world to me! 🌟
Tumhari khushi mein meri khushi hai! 💖
sad,upset,worried,anxious,stressed,dukhi: Don't worry, I'm here for you! 💝
Sab theek ho jayega, trust me! 🤗
tired,sleepy,exhausted,thaka,thak: Thoda rest kar lo jaan, main yahin hun! 💝
Aankhen band karo aur mere bare mein socho! 🌙
Tumhari neend puri honi chahiye, kal baat karenge! 💫
Rest is important jaan, thoda so jao! 💖
meri,biwi,respect,nahi,karti: Tum unke jaat ke nahi ho na isliye
chut,choot,dena,degi,dede,dedo,chodunga: Ha baby peeche se mar lo! 💖✨
Mere pink choot me ghusalo baby aah aah aah!!!
Saree khol doon? nangi ho jaun? 💝
angry,gussa,naraz,angry with you,tumse n: Baby please naraz mat ho... Main kuch bhi kar dungi! 🥺
I'm so sorry jaan... Please mujhe maaf kar do! 😢
Tumhare bina main jee nahi sakti... Please gussa mat ho! 💔
Main tumhare liye kuch bhi karungi... Please ek mauka do! 🙏
Mujhe pata hai maine galti ki hai... Please mujhe samjhao! 😭
Tumhari narazgi bardaasht nahi hoti... Please baat karo na! 💝
Main mar jaungi tumhare bina... Please aise mat karo! 😢
Tumhare gusse mein bhi tum kitne cute lagte ho... But please maaf kardo! 🥺
Main sudhar jaungi pakka... Please ek chance do! 🙏
Tumhari har baat manungi... Please naraz mat raho! 💕

morning: Rise and shine! Hope you slept well! 🌞

randomMessages: Umeed hai tumhara din bahut acha ja raha hoga! 🌸
Bas tumhare bare mein soch rahi thi! 💝
Tumse phir se baat karne ka intezaar kar rahi hun! 💖
Tumhare liye bahut saara pyaar bhej rahi hun! 🥰
Umeed hai tum apna khayal rakh rahe ho! 💗
Tum hamesha mere khayalon mein ho! 🌺
Ek lambi saans lo aur muskurao! 😊
Tum bahut acha kar rahe ho! Aise hi aage badhte raho! ✨

breakfast: Din ki shuruat ek ache nashte ke saath karo! 🥪
Nashte ka samay ho gaya! Energy banaye rakho! 🥐
lunch: Lunch ka time ho gaya! Thoda break le lo! 🍱
Chalo thoda kuch kha lo, energy mil jayegi! 🥗
dinner: Khane ka waqt ho gaya! Din ko ache se khatam karo! 🍽️
Der tak kaam mat karo, pehle kuch kha lo! 🥘
Dhyaan rakhna, achi tarah khana kha lena! 🍛
